title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9500.0 - St. Lawrence - Eastern Ontario Commission-statement of purposes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9500.0 - St. Lawrence - Eastern Ontario Commission-statement of purposes

State Regulations

The purposes of the St. Lawrence - Eastern Ontario Commission
are to insure optimum conservation, protection, preservation and development
and use of the unique, scenic, aesthetic, historic, ecological, recreational, economic and natural resources of the St. Lawrence River and eastern Lake

Ontario area and to encourage the full development of the commercial, industrial, agricultural, residential and other resources which are vital to
the continued progress of the area. In carrying out its purpose, the commission
is to accord careful consideration to, and full opportunity for, the best use
and development of all the resources of the area. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

9500.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
